title: Dead Men Get No Tail
description: Clay Parkinson has a big problem.� He doesn't understand why he's having erotic dreams and tempting thoughts about his best friend, Jack, especially since Clay is straight.� Or so he tries to convince himself. Worried about not leaving a legacy after graduation, Jack plans a fake funeral so he can enjoy the accolades while still alive.� Clay can't figure out why he hates the idea so much, until he begins to think it might be because he's accidentally fallen in love his with best friend.� Desire fi
author: Misty Malone
